name: 05 - Remove user from a channel
precondition: A user must already have been added to a channel.

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description: Run ./mattermost channel remove ateam:mynewchannel test.one
inline.expectedResult:
User no longer appears in member icon drop-down list for My New Channel.
(A hard refresh is required)

customFields.Important notes about this step:
• A hard refresh is needed to see the changes in effect.
  • Member count does not update.
